page.title: 08EDUCATION-STANLEY & OUTWOOD
page.content: ALL SCHOOLS WITHIN THE BLOCK ARE STATE MAINTAINED AND FORM THE MAJOR PORTION OF THE OUTWOOD "PYRAMID",AT THE TOP OF WHICH IS OUTWOOD GRANGE COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOL FOR 1800 PUPILS FROM 11-18.THIS IS FED BY 10 JUNIOR-AND-INFANT SCHOOLS,7 OF WHICH ARE IN OUR AREA. PRE-SCHOOL EDUCATION IS PROVIDED BY THREE NURSERY CLASSES,A NURSERY SCHOOL AND ONE PRE-5 CLASS.STANLEY WEST HALL IS A DAY SCHOOL FOR E.S.N.(M) CHILDREN. ADULT EDUCATION IS CATERED FOR BY AN EVENING INSTITUTE AT OUTWOOD GRANGE WITH CLASSES IN ACADEMIC,RECREATIONAL AND CRAFT SUBJECTS.
